entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon and risk of freezing rain. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
